title: 109_hr3301
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for five percent of the cost of a qualified truck. Defines qualified truck as a motor vehicle: (1) first placed in service on or after January 1, 2007, and before January 1, 2008, (2) powered by diesel fuel. (3) having a gross vehicle weight of more than 26,000 pounds. And (4) which complies with certain Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) regulations for diesel emissions. Allows such credit to reduce regular or alternative minimum tax liability. Permits a taxpayer election to expense the cost of qualified trucks placed in service in 2007.
